thread.title_full: The Tawse was the Scottish education system’s corporal punishment weapon of choice

title: The Tawse was the Scottish education system’s corporal punishment weapon of choice
text:
The Tawse was the Scottish education system’s corporal punishment weapon of choice 21 February   22:27 GMT 
An essential part of the teacher’s trade, the tawse was the Scottish education system’s corporal punishment weapon of choice against unruly students. 
Based in Lochgelly, Fife, John J Dick Leather Goods were teacher’s preferred suppliers of the tawse.
